sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> lifts all the <radical>trash</radical> out of the <radical>river</radical> and it <kanji>stream</kanji>s out onto the shores.
meaningInfo: As the tsunami recedes, watch as all of the trash comes streaming out of the river and crowds the bank.
readingMnemonic: Next to the trash <kanji>stream</kanji> you suddenly see <reading>Ryu</reading> (<ja>りゅう</ja>) from Street Fighter and he looks pissed. He's furious that so many people throw their trash in the river and it causes streams like this.
readingInfo: Now Ryu is punching and kicking and tatsumaki senpukyaku-ing all of the trash into burnable and non-burnable piles. But the stream doesn't end. Now he's trying to get his other Street Fighter pals to help him beat it back!
